description: A discussion starter about problems and issues facing young people. Looks at cultural understanding and racism, technological change and consumerism, apprenticeship rights, single mothers, alcoholism and drug dependence, authority, nuclear disarmament, student participation, homelessness, disabled people and unemployment.
